p: Hexachlorophene, an antibacterial compound, was found to be effective for SFTSV in in vitro screening using an FDA-approved drug library (Yuan et al., 2019). Because hexachlorophene can cause acute and subacute neurotoxicity in laboratory animals and humans (Kimbrough, 1973; Ramu et al., 2016), further in vitro and in vivo studies must be conducted.
